name: Dogmatika Encounter
text:
Activate 1 of these effects;
● Special Summon 1 "Dogmatika" monster or 1 "Fallen of Albaz" from your hand.
● Take 1 "Dogmatika" monster or 1 "Fallen of Albaz" from your GY, and either add it to your hand or Special Summon it.
You can only activate 1 "Dogmatika Encounter" per turn.
